status.description: SW with updated config was released

fields.Action:
Upgrade the DUT to clone using the WebUI

 
 * 
 ** 
 *** For verizon: 

Please use this hidden URL: 

[https://192.168.1.1/#/firmware_upgrade|https://fra01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2F192.168.1.1%2F%23%2Ffirmware_upgrade&data=05%7C01%7Chalima.damergi_ext%40softathome.com%7C1f96864581194ceade7508dbe5fc3719%7Caa10e044e4054c10835336b4d0cce511%7C0%7C0%7C638356643644752380%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=gVgMVgZ89P2G7OnqFz9AdOoTeA8ZTLLJIl1YkzNxKzk%3D&reserved=0]
fields.Expected Result:
Upgrade is triggered 

 

Front LED is blinking Fast white

fields.Action: Check the services status after the upgrade
fields.Expected Result:
After reboot, all services are still up and running:
Wan is UP and access is OK from LAN
The Wi-Fi client should connect automatically

*If WiFi Bridge connection supported:
Connection of the WiFi bridges shall be re-established. Clients connected behind the wifi bridges shall be able to contact LAN devices and access the WAN

fields.Action: Check the modified settings mentioned in the preconditions.
fields.Expected Result:
The modified parameters are upgrade persistent.
 - LAN device icon & Name modified.
 - Wifi SSID, Secrity mode and Key modified.
 - NAT/PAT rule created.
 - DynDNS account available and Synced.

fields.description:
Downgrade of the DUT using the WebUI

[Precondition]

DUT is up and all services are UP

At least 2xclient connected to Wi-Fi

Make some configuration on DUT:
 * Change LAN subnet 
 * LAN device icon & Name modified.

 - WLAN STAs connected to each Band. (2.4GHz and 5GHz)
 - Wifi SSID, Secrity mode and Key modified 
 - NAT/PAT rule created.
 - DynDNS account added and Synced.

{color:#0747a6}+*For VZ:*+ {color}

{color:#0747a6}Activate WiFi GUEST/ WiFi 6G / WiFi IOT and connect clients {color}

 

For WiFi Bridges support and availability:
 - Two WiFi Bridges connected in repeater and extender modes with their WiFi Guest module ENABLED.  Clients available and connected at 2.4GHz wifi bridge (repeater mode) and 5GHz wifi bridge (extender mode) and also on the WiFi Guest of the WiFi bridges
Note:  WiFi bridges shall stay connected (and if possible with clients connected behind them) through the complete execution of the test campaign

status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.
